description:
Project Description:
Pareena Enorme is a well established housing venture based in Sector 99A Dwarka Expressway Gurgaon. This endeavor is strategically built on a favorable area which is directly linked to many primary places in Gurgaon. In the last few years the area has experienced many developments when you look at the infrastructure and various other public utilities compared to nearby suburbs.


Pareena Enorme provides well crafted residences of 2BHK 1550 sq.ft. flats in a comfortable living space. Every residential unit available here include sufficient useable space in the combined developed area range of 1550 sq ft each. These units have premium indoor specs along with skillful planning and structure. Also, its well put house windows and spacious balconies will make sure good ventilation and natural light inside each residence.


VP Spaces Grandeur furthermore presents a calm outdoor gated area with an abundance of beneficial amenities and services. These outdoor specs comprise of landscaped gardens and enough open green area offering dedicated walking and jogging trails, with sufficient parking area. The project provides a number of superior quality amenities such as a modern Clubhouse, pool as well as other indoor and outdoor games facilities. Furthermore, the group has ensured a comfortable living space with full electricity backup and round the clock water supply. Safety at this venture is guaranteed by modern equipment and planning like RCC framed structures, CCTV vigilance, fire fighting systems and adequate manned patrolling in the residential compound.


This project is built by Pareena Infrastructures Pvt Ltd., a reliable group in the real-estate of Gurgaon Delhi NCR. The Group has delivered wide range of housing and commercial ventures throughout the city and their staff is known for strenuous and timely work.
metatitle: Get prepared for pleasurable lifestyle at Pareena Enorme.
metadesc: Situated in Sector 99A, Gurgaon, Pareena Enorme is a residential project by Pareena Infrastructures Pvt Ltd.. It has apartment choices of 2BHK Apartment of sizes from 1550 sq. ft.
